title: Le Bal du Regent = the Regent's Ball
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Paul Feval.
description: Episode 3 of Series "Lagardere". Aurore has moved in with Suzanne, Lagardere's old nanny, to try and avoid the spies sent by Philippe de Gonzague. Henri is trying to track down Blanche, Aurore's mother. Little does he know that she is now married to Philippe de Gonzague. Gonzague has devised a scheme to introduce to Blanche a young orphan named Flor who is to pass for Aurore.  Credits: Producer, Robert Velin ; director, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; writers, Marcel Jullian, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; photography, Georges Barsky ; music, Jacques Loussier. Cast: Jean Piat, Jacques Dufilho, Jean-Pierre Darras, Nadine Alari, Jacques Balutin, Claude Confortes, Marco Perrin, Dominique Paturel.
